Unter dem erfahrenen Manager hat sich Google von einem aufstrebenden Internetsuch-Unternehmen zu einem breit aufgestellten Technologiekonzern gemausert. Eric Schmidt ist ein toller Firmenchef und ich habe viel von ihm gelernt , sagtLarry Page in einer Telefonkonferenz. MONTPELIER- State Auditor Tom Salmon , a Republican who switched from the Democratic Party in 2009, confirmed Tuesday that he is considering running for the U.S. Senate next year against independent incumbent Bernie Sanders . We're in the very early stages, said Thomas P. Salmon of St. Johnsbury, who has alluded to challenging Bernie Sanders in Facebook messages and elsewhere. He said he would announce his decision by March 5, the birthday of the U.S. Navy Seabees, with

Going forward, we remain committed to aggressive investment in both our people and our products as we pursue an innovation agenda. Announcing financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2010. Google reported revenues of$ 7.29 billion for the quarter ended September 30, 2010, an increase of 23% compared to the third quarter of 2009
